description: This file defines a React functional component called DashboardPage that renders a dashboard interface with statistics, file upload capabilities, and a chart visualization using Recharts. It manages state for uploaded files and renders various UI elements such as cards, drag-and-drop area, file list, and an area chart with sample data.

methods.name: DashboardPage
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the dashboard with statistics, upload interface, and chart.

methods.name: StatCard
methods.description: Helper component to render individual statistic cards with title, value, and hint.
